comments.body: All the syllabus the slides, notes are all posted in PESU media discord server check thereqq
Dw abt math-1 its not relatated to 11-12th math by any means, just learn the basics of calculus you're set
Partial Differentiation, Differential Equations, Gamma and Beta Functions

Btw both campuses have the same syllabus and slides
So no need to specify
